---
title: "Getting started"

execute:
  eval: false

engine: knitr
---




## Prerequisites

To run the workflow you need to have mamba (conda also works) and snakemake installed. 

All other software required by NanoITs will be installed by snakemake for you in a conda environment.


### Install conda

 Information about installing  mamba [here](https://mamba.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mamba-installation.html) and for conda can be found [here](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda/en/latest/user-guide/install/).

### Install snakemake

To install snakemake, check out the installation instructions found [here](https://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/getting_started/installation.html). The workflow was so far tested with snakemake version 7.32.4.

### Install NanoITS

NanoITS can be installed via git:


::: {.cell}

```{.bash .cell-code}
git clone https://github.com/ndombrowski/NanoITS.git
```
:::


If you do not have git installed, you can also download the folder from github. Therefore:

1. Go to <https://github.com/ndombrowski/NanoITS>
2. Click the green code button
3. Download zip
4. Extract zip
